attributes.action: Take NHS control away from the Government of the day
attributes.additional_details:
Interest rates fluctuations have significantly reduced since the Bank of England took control of it as they are above politics and are not politically motivated for short term "wins" .

I believe by adopting this principal, there is more chance of making the efficiency savings required whilst improving the service levels to the public
attributes.background: Policies and targets are politically motivated by the sitting government and seldom have chance to be tested due to changing political parties/policies following elections.  I propose a cross party group takes control for setting NHS policies/budgets so they are given time to be implemented in full
